verses.verse: וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Kam there arose אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei And after אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> 'a-vi-Me-lech Abimelech לְהוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a' to defend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel תּוֹלָ֧ע <S%H8439><s%> to-La' Tola בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פּוּאָ֛ה <S%H6312><s%> pu-'Ah of Puah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <S%H1734><s%> do-Do of Dodo אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char; of Issachar וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- and he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev and he dwelt בְּשָׁמִ֖יר <S%H8069><s%> be-sha-Mir in Shamir בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim. Ephraim

וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot And he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וְשָׁלֹ֖שׁ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Losh and three שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot and died וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּשָׁמִֽיר׃ <S%H8069><s%> be-sha-Mir. in Shamir פ Peh

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom him arose אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav, And after יָאִ֖יר <S%H2971><s%> ya-'Ir Jair הַגִּלְעָדִ֑י <S%H1569><s%> hag-gil-'a-Di; a Gileadite וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot and judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Ta-yim and two שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- had ל֞וֹ lo שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim, sons רֹֽכְבִים֙ <S%H7392><s%> ro-che-Vim that rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim on thirty עֲיָרִ֔ים <S%H5895><s%> 'a-ya-Rim, ass colts וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and they had thirty עֲיָרִ֖ים <S%H5895><s%> 'a-ya-Rim donkeys לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem; like לָהֶ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem that יִקְרְא֣וּ׀ <S%H7121><s%> yik-re-'U which are called חַוֹּ֣ת chav-Vot יָאִ֗יר <S%H2334><s%> ya-'Ir, Havothjair עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, to this אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher it בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz which [are] in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad. of Gilead
וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died יָאִ֔יר <S%H2971><s%> ya-'Ir, And Jair וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּקָמֽוֹן׃ <S%H7056><s%> be-ka-Mon. in Camon פ Peh

וַיֹּסִ֣פוּ׀ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot did הָרַע֮ <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'av-Du and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּעָלִ֣ים <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim Baalim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעַשְׁתָּר֡וֹת <S%H6252><s%> ha-'ash-ta-Rot and Ashtaroth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods אֲרָם֩ <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram of Syria וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods צִיד֜וֹן <S%H6721><s%> tzi-Don of Zidon וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וַיַּעַזְב֥וּ <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'az-Vu and forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not עֲבָדֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-va-Du-hu. and served

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> vai-yi-char- was hot אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> 'af And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵם֙ <S%H4376><s%> vai-yim-ke-Rem and he sold בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- them into the hands פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וּבְיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-Yad and into the hands בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon

וַֽיִּרְעֲצ֤וּ <S%H7492><s%> vai-yir-'a-Tzu they vexed וַיְרֹֽצְצוּ֙ <S%H7533><s%> vay-ro-tze-Tzu and oppressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah And that year הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi; he שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh eight עֶשְׂרֵ֜ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- they all בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> bag-gil-'Ad. which [is] in Gilead

וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'av-Ru passed over בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- Moreover the children עַמּוֹן֙ <S%H5983><s%> 'am-mOn of Ammon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan לְהִלָּחֵ֛ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also בִּיהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah also against Judah וּבְבִנְיָמִ֖ין <S%H1144><s%> u-ve-vin-ya-Min and against Benjamin וּבְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> u-ve-Veit and against the house אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim וַתֵּ֥צֶר <S%H3334><s%> vat-Te-tzer distressed לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El so that Israel מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. was sore

וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying חָטָ֣אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu We have sinned לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi for עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Zav-nu against thee both because we have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> van-na-'a-Vod and also served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim. Baalim פ Peh

וַ֥יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim [Did] not [I deliver you] from the Egyptians וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, and from the Amorites וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei from the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim. Philistine

וְצִידוֹנִ֤ים <S%H6722><s%> ve-tzi-do-Nim The Zidonians וַֽעֲמָלֵק֙ <S%H6002><s%> va-'a-ma-Lek also and the Amalekites וּמָע֔וֹן <S%H4584><s%> u-ma-'on, and the Maonites לָחֲצ֖וּ <S%H3905><s%> la-cha-Tzu did oppress אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וַתִּצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> vat-titz-'a-Ku you and ye cried אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to וָאוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <S%H3467><s%> va-'o-Shi-'ah to me and I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Dam. you out of their hand

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5800><s%> 'a-zav-Tem Yet ye have forsaken אוֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti, וַתַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> vat-ta-'av-Du me and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim; other לָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will no אוֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> o-Sif you no more לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a' wherefore I will deliver אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

לְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu, Go וְזַֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> ve-za-'a-Ku and cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H977><s%> be-char-Tem which ye have chosen בָּ֑ם Bam; הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah let them יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <S%H3467><s%> yo-Shi-'u deliver לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et you in the time צָרַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H6869><s%> tza-rat-Chem. of your tribulation

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD חָטָ֔אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu, We have sinned עֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-seh- do אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you לָ֔נוּ La-nu, כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- whatever הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> hat-Tov good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha; thou unto us whatsoever seemeth אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach only הַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-nu unto thee deliver נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na please הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom us only we pray thee this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וַיָּסִ֜ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> vai-ya-Si-ru And they put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> han-ne-Char the strange מִקִּרְבָּ֔ם <S%H7130><s%> mik-kir-Bam, from among וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'av-Du them and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <S%H7114><s%> vat-tik-Tzar was grieved נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho and his soul בַּעֲמַ֥ל <S%H5999><s%> ba-'a-Mal for the misery יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וַיִּצָּֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-tza-'a-Ku were gathered together בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Then the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> bag-gil-'Ad; in Gilead וַיֵּאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'a-se-Fu assembled themselves together בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah. in Mizpeh

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei [and] princes גִלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu, to another מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, What man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יָחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> ya-Chel, [is he] that will begin לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon; Ammon יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לְרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh, head לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. of Gilead פ Peh
